projects.title: Aerodynamics Laboratory Project
description: Implemented Hess–Smith panel method and Weissinger lifting-line to compute Cp, CL, Cm and induced-drag trends.
Validated vs XFOIL/XFLR5 with < 2% relative error in lift across multiple AoA.
Compared NACA 0008 vs AG26 at Re = 3×10⁵ to 5×10⁵, analyzing transition/separation movement.
Interpreted lift distribution and induced drag sensitivity using low-speed configurations (incl. Cessna 172 comparison).

projects.title: ML-Based External Braking Assistance
description: Designed ECU-based brake pre-loading system for drum-brake vehicles using LiDAR + Hall sensors and a linear actuator.
Trained linear regression to predict pre-loading force from real-time distance + wheel-speed data.
Deployed model on an ESP32; validated prototype with bench + dynamic testing for faster engagement.
Kept architecture low-cost, non-invasive, and aftermarket-friendly.

projects.title: Fe-Based Soft Magnetic Composites
description: Studied ball milling + Al/Si reinforcements on Fe-based soft magnetic composites for EV/electromagnetic applications.
Processed four compositions (Fe, Fe–Al, Fe–Si, Fe–Al–Si) at BPR 10:1 up to 4 hours.
Characterized phase evolution and microstructure with XRD, FE-SEM, EDS; correlated particle refinement (< 2 µm) with reinforcement-assisted milling behavior.

projects.title: Laser Shock Peening on Inconel 718
description: Experimental + literature analysis of LSP effects on surface integrity and fatigue-relevant parameters.
Hands-on lab work: wire EDM specimen preparation and controlled peening trials.

projects.title: Active Debris Removal Strategies
description: Structured literature review on active debris removal mission concepts.
Prepared technical study toward aerospace conference submission, focusing on feasibility, risk, and maturity.
